channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Power BI Report Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Power BI Report Server

item.title: CVE-2020-1173|2024-08-04T06:25:01.307Z -- microsoft -- power%20bi%20report%20server
item.description: A spoofing vulnerability exists in Microsoft Power BI Report Server in the way it validates the content-type of uploaded attachments, aka 'Microsoft Power BI Report Server Spoofing Vulnerability'.
